mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim is Our Command! Feel the Power of Ultimate Privilege Today!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I strolled into a gourmet restaurant, the kind that requires reservations months in advance. I strutted up to the hostess, flashed my Bank of Entitlement card, and demanded a table for ten, no wait. When she hesitated, I threw a fit. I mean, how dare they not recognize my VIP status? The manager rushed over, apologized profusely, and cleared the entire restaurant just for me. As I enjoyed my meal, surrounded by empty tables, I basked in the sweet glow of entitlement. And you know what? I deserve every bit of it.
